name: Rebecca - Cotton dress (Liberty art fabric) (S-XL)
description:
!FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS IN DECEMBER!
Use the coupon code 'HAPPYNEWYEAR' at the checkout.
Enjoy!

We are happy to present you "Rebecca" dress from Mrs Pomeranz FW2013 collection. 
The dress is made of beautiful Liberty cotton fabric, named "Daydream". 

The AW13 Liberty Art Fabrics collection is inspired by the poem ‘The Earthly Paradise’ by William Morris. Morris was inspired and influenced by the charm, colour, sound, scenery, fragrance and beauty of the visible world. Liberty's fabric collection centres around these senses, focusing on Icelandic adventures, audio prints, tattoos on Tana Lawn, almost edible conversationals and fragrant florals, wrapping up with a sixth sense; a sense of Liberty.

Mo Coppoletta has an international reputation for unique and exquisite tattoos, so was the perfect choice to represent this collection inspired by the art of touch. 

Daydream is hand painted by Mo who was inspired by William Morris and the Arts and Crafts movement, a style that represents Liberty, as it is a Mecca for Arts and Crafts visuals. Peonies were chosen as they are known as 'the king of flowers' in Eastern tradition and defined as the flower of riches and honour bringing health, wealth and wisdom. 

Silhouette: fitted bodice with 5 big buttons covered with golden silk, three quarter sleeves and super full, gathered midi skirt with side pockets. The top and skirt are lined. The buttons at the front are for decoration only. The dress closes at the back with the zip. The top and skirt are lined. The belt covered with golden silk is included.

Fabric: 

- dress (100% cotton fabric, Liberty Art fabric)
- buttons and belt (100% silk)
- lining ( 100% cotton fabric) 

Size: 

size S (42)
bust 88
waist 70
skirt length 62

size M (44)
bust 94
waist 74
skirt length 62

size L (46)
bust 96
waist 76
skirt length 62

Size XL (48)
bust 98
waist 82
skirt length 62


How to choose your size at the checkout                                     Bigcartel won't give you an option to choose a size at the checkout. Please write us a letter (mrs.pomeranz@gmail.com) after placing  an order and mention your size and the dress that you've bought. Thank you!

name: Ida - Cotton Dress made of Liberty fabric
description:
!FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS IN DECEMBER!
Use the coupon code 'HAPPYNEWYEAR' at the checkout.
Enjoy!

We are happy to present you "Ida" dress from Mrs Pomeranz FW2013 collection. 
The dress is made of beautiful Liberty cotton fabric, named "Stanley". 

The AW13 Liberty Art Fabrics collection is inspired by the poem ‘The Earthly Paradise’ by William Morris. Morris was inspired and influenced by the charm, colour, sound, scenery, fragrance and beauty of the visible world. Liberty's fabric collection centres around these senses, focusing on Icelandic adventures, audio prints, tattoos on Tana Lawn, almost edible conversationals and fragrant florals, wrapping up with a sixth sense; a sense of Liberty.

The powerful scents that unlock memories and emotions are what inspired the Design Studio to create prints based on fragrances sold at Liberty. 

"Stanley" is created from all the ingredients in Byredo's Mr Marvellous, a fragrance launched in 2011 with top notes of petit grain and neroli, middle notes of lavender and bamboo and base notes of virginia and amber.

Silhouette: fitted bodice with "quipao collar" and three big buttons, three quarter sleeves and super full, gathered midi skirt (with side pockets). The dress closes at the back with the zip. The top and skirt are lined.

- dress (100% cotton fabric, Liberty Art fabric)
- lining ( 100% cotton fabric)

name: Josephine - Cotton Dress made of Liberty fabric (S-XXL)
description:
!FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS IN DECEMBER!
Use the coupon code 'HAPPYNEWYEAR' at the checkout.
Enjoy!

We are happy to present you "Josephine" dress from Mrs Pomeranz FW2013 collection. 

The dress is made of beautiful Liberty cotton fabric, named "Wild at heart". 
The AW13 Liberty Art Fabrics collection is inspired by the poem ‘The Earthly Paradise’ by William Morris. Morris was inspired and influenced by the charm, colour, sound, scenery, fragrance and beauty of the visible world. Liberty's fabric collection centres around these senses, focusing on Icelandic adventures, audio prints, tattoos on Tana Lawn, almost edible conversationals and fragrant florals, wrapping up with a sixth sense; a sense of Liberty.

Wild at Heart was designed by Amanda Harrison, a student at Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design and re-worked in the Liberty Design Studio. The design is named after Nikki Tibbles of Wild at Heart, who was a judge of the CSM collaboration and owns the celebrated florist of the same name. 

Silhouette: fitted bodice with 5 big buttons covered with white lace, three quarter puff sleeves trimmed with lace and super full, gathered midi skirt with side pockets. The top and skirt are lined. The buttons at the front are for decoration only. The dress closes at the back with the zip. The belt covered with white lace.

Fabric:

name: Katherine - Cotton Dress made of Liberty Fabric
description:
!FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS IN DECEMBER!
Use the coupon code 'HAPPYNEWYEAR' at the checkout.
Enjoy!

We are happy to present you "Katherine" dress from Mrs Pomeranz FW2013 collection. 
The dress is made of beauutiful Liberty cotton fabric, named "Killburn Rose". 

The AW13 Liberty Art Fabrics collection is inspired by the poem ‘The Earthly Paradise’ by William Morris. Morris was inspired and influenced by the charm, colour, sound, scenery, fragrance and beauty of the visible world. Liberty's fabric collection centres around these senses, focusing on Icelandic adventures, audio prints, tattoos on Tana Lawn, almost edible conversationals and fragrant florals, wrapping up with a sixth sense; a sense of Liberty.

Award winning actress Tamsin Greig was an obvious choice to represent the Audio fabric stories because of her beautiful and memorable voice. 
Tamsin visited the Liberty Archive and selected three archival prints from the late 80s and early 90s. These depicted roses, leaves and a fairy tale wall. The inspiration for Kilburn Rose came from Tamsin’s childhood rose garden and her love of fairytales, specifically those that featured a tower shrouded in wild yet beautiful roses. 

This dress will be custom made once you place an order based on your size and fabric choice. 

Silhouette: classic "paper doll" shape with a fitted bodice, hourglass-seamed waist, and a super full, gently pleated skirt. A wide cotton belt (2 stripes) ties around the waist. You can double wrap it across the waist and tie it at the back, centre or front as you prefer. Closes down back with hidden zipper. The top and skirt are lined.


Fabric: 
- dress (100% cotton fabric, Liberty)
- lining (100% cotton fabric)

Sizes: S M L XL XXL 

How to choose your size at the checkout                                     Bigcartel won't give you an option to choose a size at the checkout. Please write us a letter (mrs.pomeranz@gmail.com) after placing  an order and mention your size and the dress that you've bought. Thank you!

name: Manon - Cotton Dress made of Liberty fabric
description:
!FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS IN DECEMBER!
Use the coupon code 'HAPPYNEWYEAR' at the checkout.
Enjoy!

We are happy to present you "Manon" dress from Mrs Pomeranz FW2013 collection. 
The dress is made of beauutiful Liberty cotton fabric, named "Growing fonder".

The AW13 Liberty Art Fabrics collection is inspired by the poem ‘The Earthly Paradise’ by William Morris. Morris was inspired and influenced by the charm, colour, sound, scenery, fragrance and beauty of the visible world. Liberty's fabric collection centres around these senses, focusing on Icelandic adventures, audio prints, tattoos on Tana Lawn, almost edible conversationals and fragrant florals, wrapping up with a sixth sense; a sense of Liberty.

The print "Growing fonder" was created as a collaboration with a famous London tattoe artist - Mo Coppoletta. The print explores and re-interprets the famous Liberty peacock feather, it was the first design Mo created for Liberty, so he wanted to adapt a subject that defined Liberty at a glance. Mo feels Liberty epitomises English style, rooting itself in its turn of the century heritage.

Silhouette: fitted bodice with "boat neck" at the front and low neck at the back. There are 6 big buttons at the back, covered with silk. The super full skirt is gently pleated and has side pockets. the belt is covered with silk. The dress closes side with hidden zip. The skirt and top are lined.

Fabric: 

- dress (100% cotton fabric, Liberty Art Fabric)
- lining (100% cotton fabric)

Sizes: S M L XL XXL

name: Liberty of London Custom Made Garden Party Dress
description:
!FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS IN DECEMBER!
Use the coupon code 'HAPPYNEWYEAR' at the checkout.
Enjoy!

*This dress will be custom made once you place an order based on your size and fabric choice. *

Dress description
Classic "new look" silhouette with a fitted bodice, hourglass-seamed waist, and a super full, gently pleated skirt. A wide cotton belt (2 stripes) ties around the waist. You can double wrap it across the waist and tie it at the back, centre or front as you prefer. Closes down back with hidden zipper. 

Fabrics: liberty of london cotton fabrics. Liberty fabrics are among the best in the world. They have trademark designs and unique colours. Liberty's exclusive designers draw on traditional English motifs, elements of architecture, art and calligraphy.Liberty have and archive of fabrics sold in the store from the end of the 19th Century. Their collections include fabrics from every decade of the twentieth century. We focus on designs from the 60s, 50s and 40s. 
The fabric of the dress on the main photo is for inspiration only.

Measurements

We also need to know your measurements to create your beautiful dress:

Neck - 
Bust - 
Bust width (the distance between two points of your bust when you wear your normal bra, normally its no more than 8 inch)
Waist - 
Hip - 
Shoulder-to-waist - 
Shoulder-to-bust - 
Back width (its better to ask someone else to help you to take this measure, normally it should less than 17 inches) -
Back neck-to-waist - 
Neck-to-shoulder - 
Arm - 
Arm length - 
Sleeve length - 
Total length of the coat - 
Height -

How to choose your size at the checkout                                     Bigcartel won't give you an option to choose a size at the checkout. Please write us a letter (mrs.pomeranz@gmail.com) after placing  an order and mention your size and the dress that you've bought. Thank you!

name: MARIA - Shirtwaist dress made of woolen shawl (pink)
description:
!FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS IN DECEMBER!
Use the coupon code 'HAPPYNEWYEAR' at the checkout.
Enjoy!

*This dress will be custom made for you using your exact measurements.*

We are proud to present you "Maria" dress from our FW2012-2013 collection. We have named this collection "The winter flowers' . It is made of a unique yarn: Russian wollen shawls. These shawls have been manufactured in the small town of Pavlovo-Posad since 1795. At the factory they still use 19th century vintage prints. 
The shawl is called 'Spring Blossom', and it features the flowers that grow in Russian gardens: primroses, daffodils, peonies, roses and cornflowers. 
I discovered Russian shawls when I was 5: my grandmother had a beautiful shawl from Pavlovo-Posad. It was green with beautiful orange lilies, red roses and bluebells on a vibrant green background. I adored this shawl and attempted to make my first dress with it: my grandmother was't happy. So this is the second try. I hope you like it!


Silhouette: shirtwaist bodice, pointed collar and a super full, gently pleated skirt with side pockets. Closes down side with hidden zipper. Buttons and belt are made of the same fabrics as the dress. The dress is fully lined (viscose lining).

Ready to order?

This dress will be custom made for you using your exact measurements:
Neck -
Bust -
Waist -
Hip -
Shoulder-to-waist -
Shoulder-to-bust -
Back width - (be careful, this measurement usually is no more than 17 inches :)
Back neck-to-waist -
Neck-to-shoulder -
Arm -
Arm length -
Sleeve length -
Skirt length from waist -
Height -
We will send you a picture which explaines how to take all those measurements.

How to choose your size at the checkout                                     Bigcartel won't give you an option to choose a size at the checkout. Please write us a letter (mrs.pomeranz@gmail.com) after placing  an order and mention your size and the dress that you've bought. Thank you!

name: OPHELIA - Pleated Woolen Skirt (made-to-measure)
description:
!FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS IN DECEMBER!
Use the coupon code 'HAPPYNEWYEAR' at the checkout.
Enjoy!

We are proud to present you "Оphelia" skirt from Mrs.Pomeranz's FW2012-2013 collection. 
We have named this collection "The winter flowers'. All the dresses and skirts are made of 
a unique yarn: Russian wollen shawls. These shawls have been manufactured in the small Russian town of Pavlovo-Posad since 1795. At the factory they still use 19th century vintage prints.

The shawl is called 'Spring Blossom', and it features the flowers that grow in Russian gardens: primroses, daffodils, peonies, roses and cornflowers.

I discovered Russian shawls when I was 5: my grandmother had a beautiful shawl from Pavlovo-Posad. It was green with beautiful orange lilies, red roses and bluebells on a vibrant green background. I adored this shawl and attempted to make my first dress with it: my grandmother was't happy. So this is the second try. I hope you like it!

Skirt description 

Silhouette: Super full, gently pleated skirt with side pockets. Closes down side with a hidden zipper and a button. The skirt is lined (viscose).

Ready to order?

name: MARIA - Woolen Shirtwaist Dress (made-to-measure)
description:
!FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS IN DECEMBER!
Use the coupon code 'HAPPYNEWYEAR' at the checkout.
Enjoy!

*This dress will be custom made for you using your exact measurements. It will take around 3 weeks to make it.*


To be honest it's not that difficult to look amazing and lovely in summer. Skin is sun-kissed and fresh, hair is wind-blown. It is easy to dress nice too - slip on a pretty flower print dress, a pair of simple shoes and you are ready to charm the world. As the wind changes to cold and the sun hides away, it becomes less fun. The first reaction is to ditch all your beautiful dresses and put on anything warm and cozy - but not flattering at all.

But we won't compromise. Even if the snow starts in your country in November and ends in March, you can always wear beautiful dresses in winter, especially if they are made of wool and have a flower print that will always remind you of summer days.

We have named this collection "The winter flowers' . It is made of a unique yarn: Russian wollen shawls. These shawls have been manufactured in the small town of Pavlovo-Posad since 1795. At the factory they still use 19th century vintage prints.

The shawl is called 'Spring Blossom', and it features the flowers that grow in Russian gardens: primroses, daffodils, peonies, roses and cornflowers.

I discovered Russian shawls when I was 5: my grandmother had a beautiful shawl from Pavlovo-Posad. It was green with beautiful orange lilies, red roses and bluebells on a vibrant green background. I adored this shawl and attempted to make my first dress with it: my grandmother was't happy. So this is the second try. I hope you like it!

Dress description 

Silhouette: shirtwaist bodice, pointed collar and a super full, gently pleated skirt with side pockets. Closes down side with hidden zipper. Buttons and belt are made of the same fabrics as the dress. Closes down side with hidden zipper. The dress is fully lined (viscose lining).

How to choose your size at the checkout                                     Bigcartel won't give you an option to choose a size at the checkout. Please write us a letter (mrs.pomeranz@gmail.com) after placing  an order and mention your size and the dress that you've bought. Thank you!

name: "Rachel" - shirtwaist dress made of Liberty cotton fabric (red, sizes S M L XXL)
description:
We are happy to present you "RACHEL" dress" from Mrs Pomeranz's SS2013 collection "In the mood for love". 
"RACHEL" dress is made of lightweight crispy cotton fabric from Liberty's 'Botanical Garden capsule collection'. All the prints in it has been digitally printed and features designs by eminent artists Mary Fedden, Hugo Grenville and Rachel Pedder Smith which sit alongside artworks by the Liberty Art Fabrics studio and freelance designers. This print was hand painted from the lush flora of Tresco. 
Silhouette: shirtwaist fitted bodice with 9 buttons, and a super full, gently pleated skirt with side pockets. The dress closes down side with hidden zipper. The top and skirt are lined with cotton lining. The buttons are covered with green silk.

Sizes:
